children.text: Summit Lodge is a QSR located at the top of the Express Lift
Goosefeather's Pub is a Full Service restaurant / bar
Sunapee Lodge has a QSR and is our main lodge at the base of the Sunapee Express chairlift
Spruce Cafe is a QSR and is located in the Spruce Lodge

data.title: North Peak Triple Ski Patrol Station
